price: 50 Ils ont tramé un complot que Nous avons déjoué sans qu’ils en soient conscients.
arabic: وَمَكَرُواْ مَكۡرٗا وَمَكَرۡنَا مَكۡرٗا وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamakarū makran wamakarnā makran wahum lā yashʿurūna
